name: Just Catch Boxes
description:
Penguin is in trouble as the Geni has stolen his boxes which contain explosives😱. The Geni might use those boxes for his evil plans. But the Penguin  is lucky as the Geni who has stolen the boxes has his bag torn apart and the boxes are falling down. He must hurry and catch all boxes or they will explode.

Can you save the Penguin? and become Greatest Box Catcher. 

Just Catch Boxes falling from sky to survive as long as you can.

Features
  • Select Characters with different speeds and abilities.
  • Select different themes of your choice to get different feel.
  • Connect Google Play to compete with your friends.
  • Compete globally with people around the world.
  • Earn Achievements as you progress.

Special Thanks to Bayat Gamess for the amazing assets. ☺
